org.kroz.activerecord
Class CamelNotationHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.kroz.activerecord.CamelNotationHelper

public class CamelNotationHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Converts names to/from Java to SQL according to naming convention

Author:
Vladimir Kroz

This project based on and inspired by 'androidactiverecord' project written by JEREMYOT

Constructor Summary
CamelNotationHelper()
           
 
Method Summary
static java.lang.String toJavaClassName(java.lang.String sqlNotation)
          Convert name of format THIS_IS_A_NAME to ThisIsAName For each letter: if not '_' then convert to lower case and add to output string if '_' then skip letter and add next letter to output string without converting to lower case
static java.lang.String toJavaMethodName(java.lang.String sqlNotation)
          Convert name of format THIS_IS_A_NAME to thisIsAName For each letter: if not '_' then convert to lower case and add to output string if '_' then skip letter and add next letter to output string without converting to lower case
static java.lang.String toSQLName(java.lang.String javaNotation)
          Convert name of format thisIsAName to THIS_IS_A_NAME For each letter: if lower case then convert to upper case if upper case then add '_' to output before ading letter

Method Detail

toSQLName

public static java.lang.String toSQLName(java.lang.String javaNotation)
Convert name of format thisIsAName to THIS_IS_A_NAME For each letter: if lower case then convert to upper case if upper case then add '_' to output before ading letter

Parameters:
javaNotation -
Returns:
SQL name translated from Java name

toJavaMethodName

public static java.lang.String toJavaMethodName(java.lang.String sqlNotation)
Convert name of format THIS_IS_A_NAME to thisIsAName For each letter: if not '_' then convert to lower case and add to output string if '_' then skip letter and add next letter to output string without converting to lower case

Parameters:
sqlNotation -
Returns:
A name complaint with naming convention for Java methods and fields, converted from SQL name

toJavaClassName

public static java.lang.String toJavaClassName(java.lang.String sqlNotation)
Convert name of format THIS_IS_A_NAME to ThisIsAName For each letter: if not '_' then convert to lower case and add to output string if '_' then skip letter and add next letter to output string without converting to lower case

Parameters:
sqlNotation -
Returns:
A name complaint with naming convention for Java classes, converted from SQL name
